originalText.text: Writopia Lab is a place of learning and discovery. As a young student at Writopia, I was instilled with a passion and love for creative writing and storytelling.  The community there helped me gain confidence in my language and communication skills. When I entered high school, I became an after-school teaching assistant. I was honored to play a role in helping spread the joy that creative writing has brought to my life to other children and make learning fun. My entire Writopia Lab experience - from student to mentor - was rewarding and inspiring.  A big thank you to Rebecca for the wonderful community she has built at Writopia Lab!

originalText.text: Writopia has been a blessing for my daughter, she has been a part of the Wednesdays group for 4 years, and has made friends, grown as a creative writer and had amazing mentoring. Five stars always!

text.text: Writopia has been a blessing for my daughter, she has been a part of the Wednesdays group for 4 years, and has made friends, grown as a creative writer and had amazing mentoring. Five stars always!

originalText.text: Can not say enough great things about Writopia. The organization is a haven for kids of all stripes, especially those who might be shy or reluctant in other clubs or activities. The warm nurturing nature inspires kids and they blossom right before your eyes. Our son found his tribe at Writopia. 12/10 recommend.

text.text: Can not say enough great things about Writopia. The organization is a haven for kids of all stripes, especially those who might be shy or reluctant in other clubs or activities. The warm nurturing nature inspires kids and they blossom right before your eyes. Our son found his tribe at Writopia. 12/10 recommend.

originalText.text: Writopia Lab is an inspirational place for children and teens to share their creativity and ideas through writing. Writopia Lab has helped so many young people, myself included, find their voice. Writopia instructors create a workshop environment where students feel comfortable sharing their work and receiving genuine feedback from their peers. I could not recommend it more highly!

text.text: Writopia Lab is an inspirational place for children and teens to share their creativity and ideas through writing. Writopia Lab has helped so many young people, myself included, find their voice. Writopia instructors create a workshop environment where students feel comfortable sharing their work and receiving genuine feedback from their peers. I could not recommend it more highly!

originalText.text: My son had been working on his college essay for much of the late summer and early fall but was not satisfied with it. While he had always been a good writer for research papers and analyses, writing a personal essay was proving difficult. He was frustrated as he was being given the same critiques from different sources (friends and family) but nobody could show him "how" to write more personally. Being able to work on his college essay one-on-one with an accomplished writer and teacher was "eye opening" as he put it. He was ecstatic and amazed at the quality of the sessions beginning with the very first one. The flexibility of the online sessions made it very convenient for him as he commutes 45 minutes each way to school and was also in the midst of varsity sports. Best of all, the instructor did not re-write his essay for him or tell him what to write but rather helped him find his own voice. Needless to say, the final essay was wonderful. He shared it with us after he had submitted it and we were extremely touched. It was personal, heart-warming and most of all, we could hear his own voice in the essay. The essay helped him get into his first choice college - Harvard! Thank you, Writopia Lab!
